constraint.description: The Neo4j server must register all available APOC procedure types.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (apocType:APOC:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(procedure:APOC:Procedure) WHERE NOT (:Neo4jServer)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(apocType) RETURN procedure as UnregisteredProcedure ORDER BY apocType.fqn

constraint.description: The Neo4j server must register all available APOC user function types.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (apocType:APOC:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(userFunction:APOC:UserFunction) WHERE NOT (:Neo4jServer)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(apocType) RETURN userFunction as UnregisteredFunction ORDER BY apocType.fqn

concept.description: Creates a DEPENDS_ON relation between the Neo4j Server and all types declaring APOC functions or procedures.
concept.cypher: MATCH (server:Neo4jServer:Type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(requiredType), (apocType:APOC:Type) WHERE requiredType.fqn = apocType.fqn MERGE (server)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(apocType) RETURN apocType.fqn

concept.description: Labels all types declaring APOC functions or procedures with `APOC`.
Labels all types annotated with "@org.neo4j.procedure.UserFunction" with `APOC` and `UserFunction`.
concept.cypher: MATCH (userFunction:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.neo4j.procedure.UserFunction" SET userFunction:APOC:UserFunction RETURN userFunction as ApocUserFunction

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with "@org.neo4j.procedure.Procedure" with `APOC` and `Procedure`.
concept.cypher: MATCH (procedure:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.neo4j.procedure.Procedure" SET procedure:APOC:Procedure RETURN procedure as ApocProcedure

MATCH (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(neo4jServer:Type) WHERE neo4jServer.fqn="com.buschmais.jqassistant.neo4j.backend.neo4jv3.Neo4jV3CommunityNeoServer" SET neo4jServer:Neo4jServer RETURN neo4jServer as Neo4jServer
